name: Curse of the Lake
description:
A fisherman fails to heed to warnings of this cursed lake and goes fishing during a storm. Dodge spooky fish ghosts to earn points.

Follow https://twitter.com/PomshineGames for updates on future projects.

Theme: An adventure game where you battle ghosts on a boat.

http://orteil.dashnet.org/gamegen (seed: Korimaru882019)
